name: Dragon Sky Fight
description:
-----DESCRIPTION-----

Dragon Sky Fight is a simple dragon battle shoot'em'up from wich you can have moments of relax and joy when you don't know  what to do.

You're a green dragon flying in the sky and have to fight hordes of evil enemies dragons. Burn then with your fire and survive until the big boss arrives!

------FEATURES--------

  • Draconic gameplay: shoot fire like a mad and fulfill your desire of playing like a dragon!
  • Unusual shump game: you won't get bored to always see a space enviroment, cause this game is not about aliens, but about fantasy lizards! 
  • Simple and light: if you have few space on pc or don't want to lose memory, you won't have any problems. It's also the type of game to use to kill boredom.
  • 2 levels and various enemy types: for a less repetitive gameplay and more fun for yourself

And much more!
